generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Entity Avoid Block Behavior
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Allows this entity to avoid certain blocks.

fields.title: LevelSoundEvent
fields.description: The sound event to play when the mob is avoiding a block.

fields.title: Search Height
fields.description: Maximum distance to look for a block in y.

fields.title: Search Range
fields.description: Maximum distance to look for a block in xz.

fields.title: Sound Interval
fields.description: The range of time in seconds to randomly wait before playing the sound again.

fields.title: Sprint Speed Modifier
fields.description: Modifier for sprint speed. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the sprint speed faster.

fields.title: Target Blocks
fields.description: List of block types this mob avoids.

fields.title: Walk Speed Modifier
fields.description: Modifier for walking speed. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the walking speed faster.
